thread.title: Karan Kundra Will Be Seen In This Bollywood Film Next!
thread.title_full: Karan Kundra Will Be Seen In This Bollywood Film Next!

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Karan Kundra Will Be Seen In This Bollywood Film Next!
text:
Sukriti Gumber Mar . 17 . 2017 Karan Kundra 
Karan Kundra made his Bollywood debut years ago, with Vikram Bhatt ‘s thriller Horror Story. The hottie is now retuning to the silver screen with Anees Bazmi ‘s next, Mubarkan , alongside Arjun Kapoor and Anil Kapoor . 
Karan will be seen playing an NRI Punjabi in the romcom, and his character reportedly required him to undergo some physical transformation. Speaking to TOI about the film, Karan said: 
I have grown up watching Anil (Kapoor) sir’s films and it’s an honour to shoot with him. I learn so much every day. The feeling when he shakes hands with me on the set is unexplainable. It’s like a big Punjabi family coming together on a set. We crack jokes, talk in Punjabi and Anil sir shares anecdotes with us. 
We are quite excited to see this hottie on the big screen! What about you guys? 0
